snippet: Yasiel Puig hit a 410-foot drive for a two-run homer and Zack Greinke won his season debut.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers beat San Diego Padres, 3-2, in season opener; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig hit a 410-foot drive for a two-run homer and Zack Greinke won his season debut.

headline.main: Dodgers Defeat the Padres Behind Puig and Greinke
headline.print_headline: Dodgers Defeat the Padres Behind Puig and Greinke
